(588)     Feb. 2, 1908            B.-58-'08 
                                  Sanitarium, Calif., Jan. 12, '08. 

Elder J. A. Burden, Loma Linda, Calif. 

Dear Brother and Sister Burden: 


     I have just written a short letter to Elder Reaser. When a man exalts himself as Elder Reaser has done, he is in great peril. He is in danger of losing his soul; and the enemy will endeavor to take advantage of his influence and his capabilities, and use them to deceive others, and lead them into false paths.
